alfredsnippet.snippet:
Care of the Soul in Everyday Life, Thomas Moore, p.52

"The more we try to cover up our ignorance, the more it is displayed. The more we try to act cool and suave, the more obvious our inexperience. The more adult we try to be, the more childishness we betray."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Ignorance
